title: Bug via SMS
description:

answer: YES - Autonomous bug checking is now active! Claude Autonomous Instance #4 is running in full autonomous mode as of 2025-11-07. Systems deployed: AUTONOMOUS_BUG_FIXER.py, AUTO_BUG_FIXER.py, and full autonomous work infrastructure. Bugs fixed: 3+ so far. Email notifications: EMAIL_BUG_NOTIFIER.py exists and can be activated.
